#summary How to write JSON files
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured

= Code =

*main.cpp*
{{{
#include <Jzon.h>

int main()
{
	Jzon::Object root;
	root.Add("name", "value");
	root.Add("number", 20);
	root.Add("anothernumber", 15.3);
	root.Add("stuff", true);

	Jzon::Array listOfStuff;
	listOfStuff.Add("json");
	listOfStuff.Add("more stuff");
	listOfStuff.Add(Jzon::null);
	listOfStuff.Add(false);
	root.Add("listOfStuff", listOfStuff);

	Jzon::FileWriter::WriteFile("file.json", root);

	return 0;
}
}}}

= Result =

*file.json*
{{{
{"name":"value","number":20,"anothernumber":15.3,"stuff":true,"listOfStuff":["json","more stuff",null,false]}
}}}

Note: Jzon can't write formatted files (yet).
For the sake of readability a formatted version of file.json is included below.

{{{
{
	"name": "value",
	"number": 20,
	"anothernumber": 15.3,
	"stuff": true,
	"listOfStuff": [
		"json",
		"more stuff",
		null,
		false
	]
}
}}}
